data.message: I need help with being harassed. I have replied to a support message but not sure that is going to do the trick.

replies.message: No, just as I thought I got a message stating that they didn't get what they needed to reinstate my account. My account has been reinstated as of Friday. I think that they are referring to another account I had but didn't use. I don't care about that. I want the harassment to stop. I have only this account and want someone to pay attention to what I am saying.

We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Paula. If you feel you're in immediate danger, please contact your local authorities. Depending on the seriousness of the situation, you can learn more about the tools Facebook offers to help you deal with bullying and harassment here: http://bit.ly/2yXFPw1. You can also find more information, tools and resources on our Bullying Prevention Hub here: http://bit.ly/2zie41X. -Elizabeth
